title: Sewing Notions Quiz
description: How well do you know sewing supplies and notions? Test your knowledge of needles, threads, and tools of the trade.

questions.question: What is a thimble used for in sewing?
options: Protecting the finger when pushing a needle

questions.question: Which sewing tool is a small cushion used to hold pins and needles?
What is a seam ripper used for?
Which tool is used to transfer pattern markings onto fabric using a spiked wheel?
What are pinking shears designed to do?
options: Cut fabric with a zigzag edge to prevent fraying

questions.question: What is a bobbin in sewing?
options: A small spool that holds the lower thread in a sewing machine

questions.question: Which sewing notion is a flat, flexible strip used to measure body dimensions for fitting?
What is bias tape used for?
Which notion is a hook-and-loop fastener commonly known by the brand name Velcro?
What is a bodkin used for in sewing?
options: Threading elastic or ribbon through casings

questions.question: Which type of scissors has short, angled blades designed for trimming threads close to fabric?
What is tailor's chalk used for?
options: Marking fabric for cutting or sewing

questions.question: Which sewing notion is a small metal or plastic device used to help push thread through the eye of a needle?
What is interfacing used for in sewing?
options: Adding structure and stability to fabric

questions.question: Which tool is a curved, transparent ruler used for drawing smooth necklines and armholes on patterns?
